meanings.definition: The quality or state of being friendly.
meanings.sent1: Her friendliness towards everyone made her very popular at school.
meanings.sent2: I appreciate the friendliness of the staff at this restaurant.
meanings.sent3: The friendliness of the puppy towards the mailman was unexpected but adorable.
meanings.sent4: The friendliness of the small town was like a warm hug to the visitors.
meanings.sent5: The friendliness of the sun on a cold day can lift your spirits.

meanings.definition: The behavior or attitude of being kind and pleasant towards others.
meanings.sent1: His friendliness towards his new classmates helped him make friends quickly.
meanings.sent2: The friendliness of the receptionist put me at ease as soon as I walked in.
meanings.sent3: The friendliness of the cat towards the mouse was suspiciously charming.
meanings.sent4: The friendliness of the waves lapping at the shore was calming and inviting.
meanings.sent5: The friendliness of the old tree in the garden made it feel like a wise guardian.
